summary: Changed some of the Skyrim default musics to a better and more immersive version.
descriptionHtml:
Bored of the default Skyrim musics ??? So this mod is for you !!

I\'ve changed a total of 47 musics (Most musics remains unchanged , this is why I think they are ok and because I want some feedback before changing more things)

[NOTE] ------> This is my first mod in all my life for a game , so if you really like my mod please endorse me to give me reasons to keep doing mods for this awesome game.

[NOTE2] ----> My mod is still in WIP (Work in progress) , so if you dont like something just tell me and maybe I will change in a future update.

Potential issue ----- > seems the first time you enter in Dragonsreach (Imperial Castle) the game loads the wrong music (it loads the Stormcloaks music). To fix this simply re-enter in Dragonsreach or go to the Stormcloaks Castle and come back.

-----------------------------  Skyrim Musics Overhaul V1 -----------------------------------

Features :

- Changed menu music to a more \"heroic\" version.

- Changed all Town musics to a more medieval version.

- Changed all exploration musics to match the time of day:
Morning / Day -----> To a more medieval version.
Dusk / Night -------> To a more gothic version.

- Changed Imperial castle music and Stormcloaks castle music.

- Changed all combat musics to a heavy metal version.

- Changed the level up music to the level up music of Call of Duty MW2. (Battlefield fans please don\'t hate me :D )

---------------------------------------- Musics Used ------------------------------------------------

Bands:

Two Steps From Hell ----- > Menu , all exploration (morning/day) musics
Renaissence ------- > 1 Town music
and some others which I don\'t know who are the composers/makers.

Games:

Painkiller (Dream Catcher / People Can Fly) ------- > 3 combat musics and some exploration (dusk/night) musics
Killing Floor (Tripwire Interactive) ------ > 2 combat musics.
Knights and Merchants - The Shattered Kingdom (Joymania / Topware) ----- > 2 town musics.
Metro 2033 (4A games / THQ) ------- > 1 Town music
Call of Duty MW2 (Infinity Ward / Activision) ------ > Level up music.

------------------------------ PREVIEW ------------------------------------

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3fXl29NJoWU
author: H3llRaiser
